text:
June 19, 1961
Mr. Elmer G. Sulaer, Director
Radio-TV Ctoamunications
Station WOT (ffl)
Indiana University
Bloomington, Indiana
Dear Bromos
In line with our exchange of correspondence regarding NAEB exhibits at
summer workshops etc*, I*m enclosing a list of events taken from the
Calendar of Events put out by (why, I don’t %uite know) the Department
of the Army. I’ve gone through the whole list and picked out these
meetings as possibilities for us to investigate*
What do you think?
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Betty McKenzie
Publications Editor
BMD/dp
enclosure
/
ccs Harold E. Hill
